title: "How does multi-dimensional awareness and the emotional dimension affect our experiences?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the reader is introduced to the concept of emotional dimension in manifestation, and how traumatic experiences can collapse, merge and solidify all dimensions of manifestation. The chapter focuses on feeling feelings without judgment or the intention of getting rid of them, and transmuting energy through change and alteration. last_phrase: The practice of feeling feelings without intending to get rid of them can help in transmuting all types of experiences, including emotional and thinking energies. By allowing them to be as they are, without any judgment or evaluation, the experience can reorganize itself and move closer towards the quantum level of pure energy. Work with the emotional dimension to achieve this state and allow for the fusion and undifferentiated solidification of all dimensions.
